Package org.apache.sis.gui.dataset

package org.apache.sis.gui.dataset
Widgets about data store resources and their metadata. Those widgets can show a hierarchical collection of Resources in a tree, and show their content in other panel when a resource is selected. The resources can optionally be loaded from a file in background thread.
Since:
1.1

Defined in the sis-javafx module
